meta.description: The Chopra App puts personalized support in the palm of your hand. Relax with our best meditations, well-being tools, tips, and practices based on Deepak’s Chopra’s wisdom and scientific research.

title: Meditation & Well-being app
cleaned_text: I’ve struggled with anxiety for a while and I appreciate that this app gives me different ways to check-in, relieve my stress and promote my wellness – even during busy days.

opengraph.title: Chopra: Meditation & Well-being app
